title: [Silver - Gold] Duo Recruitment
body:
Currently around Silver 2 - 3. It is really a pain to SoloQ and get random people who sometimes be toxic or unskilled (basics like warding, game sense, etc.) I want to play more competitively and serious to get the ranks up. I can play any role as I am very dynamic player (not boasting) and have a big champion pool. I played lee sin alot season 4 and season 5 but also have at least basic or maybe more understanding and knowledge about other champions. 

Current three top champions: {{champion:64}}{{champion:67}} {{champion:238}} 
Current tier (rank): Silver 3
Most played positions: Jungle and Support

Add me: Erue
Please, please add me if you are interested as I may forget to check the boards for the replies. Reply and Add me!


To start off we will play some normal games together and see if we can cooperate well (because that is the point of playing as a duo) then play ranked games. 

I prefer Teamspeak3 to communicate each other
Must be over Silver 3

Thank you

replies.body: Hi im Silver 5 and chilled with games never gets toxic  and i can play all role but not all champs.

Hi, I'm a support main if you're still interested.
Add me PalmerJackal
I don't have Teamspeak, but I've got Curse and Discord if you still wanted to chat.
